title: Please don't leave me
creator_credit: Film Australia, Robin Hughes and Stephen Ramsey
brief_description: Shows through examples, how young children can be prepared for the experience of going into hospital alone. Photographers, Tony Wilson, Dean Semler; editor, Nick Torrens; sound, Jeff Doring, Brian Morris, Tim Lloyd.
